abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks have a chance to inflict critical damage.
notes: The proc is determined during the unit's attack point
The proc chance of multiple sources stack
When multiple critical strike sources proc simultaneously, the higher critical factor takes precedence
Increases attack damage by an average of 18%
Displays critical strike values before all damage manipulation sources for camouflaging purposes
